definition: lit. yellow does not reach green (idiom); the yellow autumn crop does not last until the green spring crop/temporary deficit in manpower or resources/unable to make ends meet
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
surname Huang or Hwang
yellow/pornographic/to fall through
(negative prefix)/not/no
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: There are not enough trained younger men and women ready to take over from older experts.
sentences.chinese: 现在科技人材青黄不接。

sentences.english: Its few diplomats are good, but terribly overstretched.
sentences.chinese: 其优秀的外交家很少，又青黄不接。

sentences.english: He is also one of a dwindling breed of Kunqu artists.
sentences.chinese: 昆曲传人青黄不接，他是其中之一。

rivers pour away by the day (idiom); going from bad to worse/deteriorating day by day

shortage
to lack food supplies
not a single grain was reaped (as in a bad harvest year)

famine/critical shortage of grain
crop failure/poor harvest
now/at present/subocular (medicine)
